About The CompanyInnovative organization building a generative media platform for speech synthesis & voice cloningIndustryInformation Technology and ServicesTypePrivately HeldFounded2016Employees11-50CategoriesArtificial IntelligenceAudioMachine LearningPodcastSoftwareTechnologyInternetSpecialtiesText to SpeechAudioVoiceoverE-learning Podcasts Text to Audio ConversionAIGenerative AIand AI Voice GenerationAbout The RoleThe Head of Growth will be responsible for leading the growth initiatives and processes to achieve maximum platform expansion and long-term growth objectives.Hiring Manager TitleCo Founder & Chief Executive Officer (CEO)Travel PercentLess than 10%FunctionsMarketingProduct MarketingKnown RequirementsBachelor's degree in the relevant field requiredSubstantial experience in a similar role with a growth mindset and backrgound marketing, advertising, and growth in a startup environment requiredExcellent written and verbal communication skills required
